The Golden State Warriors secured a thrilling victory over the Houston Rockets, with Stephen Curry leading the charge with a 40-point performance.
In a pulsating match, the Rockets almost stole the game in the final seconds, but their efforts fell just short.
Star player Stephen Curry delivered an exceptional performance, exciting fans and critics alike.
The rivalry between the Warriors and the Rockets was evident in the intense showdown, making it a highly anticipated event in the NBA calendar.
The game was a clash of titans, showcasing the best of NBA basketball.
Some fans remarked sarcastically that the Rockets would have fared better with a different lineup.
